title: (inserted by section 3(d) of the Forestry (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020
heading: 1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Agriculture Appeals (Section
text_raw:
1. (1) These Regulations may be cited as the Agriculture Appeals (Section 

14A) Regulations 2023. 

(2) These Regulations come into operation on 11 September 2023.
text_norm: 1 (1) regulation may cited agriculture appeal (section 14a) regulation 2023 (2) regulation come operation 11 september 2023

title: (inserted by section 3(d) of the Forestry (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020
heading: 2. The period of 14 working days is prescribed for the purposes of section
text_raw:
2. The period of 14 working days is prescribed for the purposes of section 
14A(4)(a) of the Agriculture Appeals Act 2001 in place of the period referred to 
in that paragraph.
text_norm: 2 period 14 working day prescribed purpose section 14a(4)(a) agriculture appeal act 2001 place period referred paragraph

title: (inserted by section 3(d) of the Forestry (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020
heading: 3. (1) The decision referred to in section 14A(4)(a) of the Agriculture
text_raw:
3. (1) The decision referred to in section 14A(4)(a) of the Agriculture 
Appeals Act 2001 shall be published as soon as practicable, preferably on the 
day the decision is made. 

(2) Where the decision referred to in paragraph (1) is not published on the 
day the decision is made, the number of working days specified in Regulation 2 
shall be extended by the number of working days (or part thereof) that elapsed 
between the decision day and the publication of the decision, but shall not exceed 
the period of 28 days specified in section 14A(4)(a) of the Agriculture Appeals 
Act 2001.
text_norm: 3 (1) decision referred section 14a(4)(a) agriculture appeal act 2001 shall published soon practicable preferably day decision made (2) decision referred paragraph (1) published day decision made number working day specified regulation 2 shall extended number working day (or part thereof) elapsed decision day publication decision shall exceed period 28 day specified section 14a(4)(a) agriculture appeal act 2001

title: (inserted by section 3(d) of the Forestry (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020
heading: 4. Regulation 2 of the Agriculture Appeals Act 2001 (Section 14A)
text_raw:
4. Regulation 2 of the Agriculture Appeals Act 2001 (Section 14A) 

Regulations 2021 (S.I. No. 353 of 2021) is revoked. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

24 August, 2023. 

CHARLIE MCCONALOGUE, 

Minister for Agriculture, Food and the Marine. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
"Iris Oifigiúil" of 29th August, 2023. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [423] 3

title: (inserted by section 3(d) of the Forestry (Miscellaneous Provisions) Act 2020
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations have the purpose of extending the amount of time that an 
appellant has to make an appeal against a forestry licence decision from 14 days 
to 14 working days. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [423]
